titleStmt.title: To the honourable the knights, citizens, and burgesses in the Commons Hovse of Parliament now assembled, the humble petition of 15000 poore laboring men known by the name of porters, and the lowest members of the citie of London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Oulton and G. Dexter, for John Bull,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: creased and torn, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
